tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_market_trends (
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    artwork_title VARCHAR(255),
    medium VARCHAR(100),
    year_created INT,
    auction_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE art_market_prices (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR,
    artist_name VARCHAR,
    sale_price DECIMAL,
    sale_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE auction_results (
    auction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    auction_date DATE,
    winner_name VARCHAR,
    winning_bid DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE artist (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE artwork (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR,
  artist_id INT REFERENCES artist(artist_id),
  price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE auction_result (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_id INT REFERENCES artwork(artwork_id),
  auction_date DATE,
  winning_bid DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Artworks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist VARCHAR,
  title VARCHAR,
  year INT,
  price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Artists (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  nationality VARCHAR,
  birth_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE Auctions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auction_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR,
  total_sales DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Sales (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_id INT,
  auction_id INT,
  sale_price DECIMAL
)
